title: Ticket #7194: Remove old job event log reader.
description:
We replaced the broken job event log reader code, but had to restore it in #6939 because the new API didn't quite do everything it needed to do.

We then updated the new API in #6944 so that it could.

Once CRAB has verified that the new API works for them, and that they've moved over, but in every case before the next stable series, remove the old (and still broken) job event log reader code.
creator: tlmiller
